page.title: 05Fishing on the Avon.
page.content: I go fishing on the River Avon with my dad. Sometimes my sister comes too.My daddy occasionally enters fishing competitions on the River Avon and sometimes on the lake. I have my own fishing rod and reel. I also have some small weights and floats. When I go river fishing I take maggots always and sometimes worms.I have caught lots of 'daddy ruffe',but we only keep the bigger ones. When we have finished fishing we put them back in the water.I have caught minnows and a little trout. My dad has caught chubb, an eel,a barbel,and lots more freshwater fish. We often go fishing after breakfast and take our sandwiches with us and stay until tea time. I learnt to fish when I was five . I enjoy fishing very much because it is very quiet and peaceful.
